value.name: Prince George's County Officers Involved In Deadly Shooting Of Leonard Shand Won't Be Charged
value.description: The Prince George's County police officers involved in a deadly shooting of an armed man in Hyattsville last September will not be indicted, the county's state's attorney's office said Thursday.

value.name: Families of those killed by police gather in Baltimore, encouraged that state will take a second look at their cases
value.description: Emotions were strong, and Jones was joined by relatives of Korryn Gaines and Leonard Shand, who were shot and killed by police. The demonstration was held outside of the Forensic Medical Center at ...
